resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Add network connectivity check after connection failures between Broker and vsphere

comments.body: [~hspencer], you should see an error message if direct connection to the endpoint is possible.

Hey [~vasya],

In my testing, I rebooted the VMware ESXi machine (which would cause temporary network communication failure to the VMware Broker - correct me if I am wrong here).  I checked the logs, and there is nothing that shows an error regarding communication with the VMWare ESXi machine:
{code}
